name: Feral Hog Simulator
description:
Your young kids are playing in the yard. How will you deal with 30-50 feral hogs, now that the government has banned assault weapons? With shuriken, bear traps, TNT, and orbital lasers, of course!

Controls:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
Click - Use Weapon
Space - Jump

Gamepad also works in game, but not in menus.

Built for Ludum Dare 46.
